meanings.definition: A person who manages or directs
meanings.sent1: The gerent of the team made sure everyone knew their roles.
meanings.sent2: The gerent oversaw the project from start to finish.
meanings.sent3: The gerent joked that managing the chaos was like herding cats.
meanings.sent4: She was the gerent of the household, keeping everything in order.
meanings.sent5: The gerent's leadership inspired the team to work harder.

meanings.definition: Having the power to manage or direct
meanings.sent1: The gerent decision was to implement a new strategy.
meanings.sent2: Her gerent attitude helped her take charge in difficult situations.
meanings.sent3: The gerent authority figure surprised everyone with a dance routine.
meanings.sent4: His gerent presence in the room commanded attention.
meanings.sent5: The gerent CEO led the company to great success.
